meanings.definition: An organized effort to oppose or counteract a campaign.
meanings.sent1: The countercampaigns aimed to stop the harmful messages of the campaign.
meanings.sent2: The company launched countercampaigns to protect its reputation.
meanings.sent3: The countercampaigns against unhealthy snacks were quite successful.
meanings.sent4: Her countercampaigns were like a shield against false information.
meanings.sent5: The countercampaigns stood out like a bright light in the darkness of misinformation.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in activities to counter a campaign.
meanings.sent1: Their countercampaigns involved spreading awareness about the truth.
meanings.sent2: Students organized countercampaigns to promote recycling in the school.
meanings.sent3: The countercampaigns to bring back recess were met with cheers.
meanings.sent4: His countercampaigns were a powerful force against ignorance.
meanings.sent5: The countercampaigns roared like a lion, challenging the status quo.
